Text:
Hi, -Gabe-.  I notice you specialize in older stuff.  Could I request a 1080p version of  La Boheme: Il Film with Anna Netrebko   http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1157547/

There's only one HD on TPB, and the uploader TOOK OUT THE INCLUDED ENGLISH SUBS!!!! No subs can be found online, either.  I'd be really grateful.

The problem is that I couldn't find it anywhere. This is what you got? http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7446484/PUCCINI_-_LA_BOHEME_2008_REMUX_HD

It should have english sub included. 

All I found is this:
Puccini.La.Boheme.2009.Blu-ray.720p.x264.DTS-KBu.torrent 

but its 2009 not 2008 so I think is smth else.
You have a lot of classics in HD. I love your channel. Thanks.
Thanks you schnitzelburger for your kind appreciation. The bad thing is that I cannot aford to upload them all... :(
